name: Brickochet
description: Brickochet revitalizes classic brick breaking action in this fast-paced, explosive arcade game that all can enjoy!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.8GHz processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 40 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.4GHz processor or faster Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 40 MB available space Additional Notes: Resolution of 1920x1080 or any multiple of 960x540 preferred
